about_the_game:
Black dog is a puzzle game where you will guide Ofelia, a lovely young girl, looking for her lost sister Amelia.
The game unravels between reality and dreams, exploring the darkness and the light that habit everyone's soul.
Discover clues to solve the riddles, find particular object to help make your way, talk with strange and weird characters, that sometimes will help you and other times will try to block your path.
Divided in multiple chapters, the story will pose you choices that will change your progression and the result of your search.
Will Ofelia find her sister? Will she discover the truth about the black dog haunting Amelia?



Ofelia wakes up worried in her bed, after a bad nightmare that looked so real! Her twin sister Amelia is tortured by an obscure shadow that seems taking away her life essence.
Amelia has really disappeared and a dark trail on the floor brings Ofelia in the dusty attic. Noone went up there since a long time, the attic is full of old furnitures and boxes, but is a strange book that catches her attention: could it be the way to find Amelia?
A perilous journey is starting, will Ofelia be able to reunite with her loved sister?



  • A dark oniric world to explore, filled with memories, fears and hope
  • A lovely and charming hand made pixel art style
  • An entracing story, wavering between light and darkness
  • Lots of puzzles, logical and psycological
  • Multiple endings, based on your choices
  • A dark and thrilling soundtrack to accompany your journey
